snippet: Sam Freeman, a reliever with the Cardinals, made his major league debut on Friday night as Johan Santana was in the midst of a no-hitter for the Mets.
lead_paragraph: Sam Freeman, a reliever with the Cardinals, made his major league debut on Friday night as Johan Santana was in the midst of a no-hitter for the Mets.

headline.seo: Cardinals’ Freeman Reflects on Debut in Mets No-Hitter
headline.main: For a Cardinals Pitcher, It’s Also a Night of Firsts
headline.print_headline: For a Cardinals Pitcher, It’s Also a Night of Firsts
